name: SKULLHUNT
description:
Your skulls have found themselves lost in the maze! Take your trusty pumpkin basket and find them! But be aware of evil pumpkins lurking around!

Created for the spooky gamejam.

Playing with headphones is advised.

Music, sound, graphics and coding have been done by Sander De Keukelaere.

Software used: Unity, Blender and Musescore
